name: hdfs
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache HDFS Service is being installed.

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/current/usage/service-guides/hdfs/
	Issues: https://jira.dcos.io/projects/DCOS_HDFS
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache HDFS Service has been uninstalled.
Please follow the instructions at http://docs.mesosphere.com/current/usage/service-guides/hdfs/#uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in beta.  You must perform an advanced install and check the opt-in option.  Contact Mesosphere before deploying this beta candidate data service framework.  There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.
